all.title: App version outdated
all.message: Please update to the latest version of the SODA by using our auto-update feature or download from here.

win32.title: Welcome to version 9.3.2 for Windows!
win32.message:
New features:
  • Guided Mode
    • When Pennsieve link is copied an alert was created. Sometimes multiple alerts were created at once and has been patched to only do so once.
  • Freeform Mode
    • Accounts failing to pass consortium check has been patched.
    • Prepare Metadata -> Dataset description ->; Click here to select my dataset from Pennsieve: would hide the page after selecting a dataset. Has been patched to behave accordingly.
    • Prepare Metadata -> Dataset description ->; Edit protocols: Duplicate protocols will not be allowed and when editing a protocol the current name can accepted again.
  • Guided Mode
    • Added a new page to let users know what accounts and documents they will be needing to curate a dataset.
    • Manifest files now automatically update when changes are made to a dataset's structure.
    • Contributor addition flow upgraded to make AirTable contributor importation more intuitive.
    • Dataset upload error alerts now give a clearer reason as to why the dataset upload failed and what can be done to remedy the issue.
    • Simplified the UI for selecting a SPARC award.
  • Freeform Mode
    • Add Airtable popup now has dropdown information for 'I can't find my SPARC Award'.

    • Prepare Metadata -> Dataset description ->; Click here to select my dataset from Pennsieve: would hide the page after selecting a dataset. Has been patched to behave accordingly.

  • Guided Mode
